contents.text: Welcome to Qwilt, enabling service providers throughout the Peninsula to build and operate a high-performance delivery layer at the true edge of their networks.
For support with your existing Qwilt deployment, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our incident response team.

navigationGoals: I need urgent help with a network outage.
I need urgent assistance with a critical network outage on my existing Qwilt deployment.
I need to escalate a critical network outage impacting my Qwilt edge nodes immediately.
I need to report an urgent network outage and get immediate help
I need urgent support to resolve a critical network outage in our Qwilt deployment at the physics lab.

contents.text: One moment please, we're connecting you with a technical specialist.

navigationGoals: I need assistance updating my configuration to improve throughput.
I need guidance on configuring my current Qwilt edge platform settings.
I’m looking for a specialist to help me optimize my cache configuration parameters.
I need step-by-step assistance troubleshooting my Qwilt setup
I need assistance configuring my existing Qwilt edge cache for high-throughput data from my simulations.

contents.text: For sales inquiries, new service deployments, or partnerships, press 2.
For sales and provisioning of new Qwilt edge solutions, press 1.
Please hold while we transfer you to our sales team.

navigationGoals: I want to set up a new Qwilt edge deployment for our upcoming network expansion.
I want to discuss purchasing new Qwilt edge solutions for an upcoming project.
I want to order and provision additional Qwilt edge appliances for a new point-of-presence.
I want to get pricing and order a new Qwilt edge solution
I’d like to order and deploy new Qwilt edge devices for our university research network.

contents.text: For partnerships, API integration, or custom deployments, press 2.
One moment, we're connecting you with our partnerships team.

navigationGoals: I'm looking to integrate Qwilt's API into our platform and discuss a partnership.
I’m looking to explore a partnership for API integration with Qwilt’s edge services.
I’m exploring a custom API integration partnership to extend Qwilt’s edge delivery capabilities.
I’d like to discuss a custom API integration or partnership with Qwilt
I’m looking to integrate Qwilt APIs for a custom content delivery pipeline in my physics research partnership.
